name: Quasar Expeditions
tag_list: galapagos-islands, patagonia, south-america, travel, tours, sightseeing, cruises, expeditions, adventures
overview:
Providing 27 years of travel experience. Quasar Expeditions’ Jeep Patagonia tours and luxury cruises to the Galapagos Islands are once-in-a-lifetime experience.

On Quasar Expeditions’ Patagonia adventures, you experience the region a bit differently. On our Jeep®-sponsored programs we provide access to the full circuit of amazing Patagonian sites in both Chile and Argentina, including National Parks Torres del Paine and Los Glaciares, and the mighty Perito Moreno Glacier. Each night you will enjoy luxury lodgings and incomparable locations, always under the care of the very best people.

On Quasar Expeditions’ Galapagos cruises, you will encounter giant Galapagos tortoises, prehistoric marine iguanas and unique species of penguins, flightless cormorants and flamingos up-close and personal. Guided along your Galapagos cruise by the most experienced naturalists, you feel like you are the first people to come across this natural paradise. Our distinctive yachts offer boutique hotel service, but are outfitted for true expeditions.
